name: Sinister Halloween Oculus Go
description:
Experience Halloween Horror in OculusGO.

Its Halloween night and you decide to take a shortcut to the big party.
Are you brave enough to pass through a Haunted Forrest?

Tell us what you think and Happy Halloween.

We planned to make a demo for the Oculus GO store page, but now Oculus doesn't support new Go games for the store.
